message: Let's split it in a 70/30 ratio. I believe this is fair considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I think a 60/40 split is a more equitable way to share the money.  While your proposal recognized the value decrease, I believe a closer split is more fair in the long run.
I propose a 50/50 split. This maintains fairness while also acknowledging the diminishing value of money in each subsequent round.
